text: The Story of Our Home () is a 2016 North Korean drama movie directed by Ri Yun-Ho and was the first North Korean movie to screen publicly in South Korea in 2018. It stars Paek Sol-mi, Kim Thae-Gum and Kim Pom-Gyong. ==Other websites== * Category:2016 drama movies Category:North Korean movies Category:Movies about orphans
title: The Story of Our Home
